```py
>>> from sympy.physics.qho_1d import E_n
>>> from sympy.abc import x, omega
>>> E_n(x, omega)
hbar*omega*(x + 1/2) 
```

```py
>>> from sympy.physics.qho_1d import psi_n
>>> from sympy.abc import m, x, omega
>>> psi_n(0, x, m, omega)
(m*omega)**(1/4)*exp(-m*omega*x**2/(2*hbar))/(hbar**(1/4)*pi**(1/4)) 
```
